planet.name: Kepler-54 b
KOI 886.01
KID 7455287
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 8.01 days for 3.4129 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.

planet.name: Kepler-54 c

KID 7455287
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 12.07 days for 4.9738 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
